mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class Controller.ChesstoryGame
 
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class Controller.RulesEditor
 
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class gui.YetAnotherChessGame
What happens when you click on the chess board with your mouse !
2 possibles cases :
- right click : display informations on the piece in the logs.
- left click : if no piece is already focused, it focus this one and show, if needed, its possible moves.
